description.brief: Laser Tilt controller for the Wubble Robot

package.description: A driver plugin to the ax12_driver_core manager.py node. Controls the tilt joint of the Hokuyo laser. This controller is specific to the Wubble Robot. One Dynamixel AX-12+ servo creates this joint and it can be controlled with a tilt angle in integer degrees, and the number of cycles.
package.author: UA Robotics Research Group
